description: Transactionware General Merchandise, also known as Transactionware GM, is a transaction-management and point-of-sale program used by specialty retailers, department stores, and other vendors. It includes POS Express, a point-of-sale transaction component that allows retailers to process transactions.

Optionally, retailers can configure Transactionware GM to suspend transactions if they meet certain parameters. These suspended transactions are saved as SUS files, which use filenames such as 0001.sus . Transactionware GM also saves transactions suspended due to power failure in SUS files. These files use filenames like powfail.sus .

common_filenames.description: Powfail.sus - A suspended transaction created due to power failure.
